service_figures: INT. has over 27 years of experience in delivering digital services, with a team of more than 1000 professionals. The company has successfully completed over 11,000 projects, accumulating more than 6 million hours of work. Their expertise spans various sectors including BFS, Life Sciences, Insurance, and Retail, showcasing their capability in transforming ideas into analytics-driven solutions. INT. operates in multiple countries including India, the UK, the USA, Singapore, and Canada, indicating a broad international presence.
